name: You're Not Alone My Friend
description:
YOU'RE NOT ALONE MY FRIEND is developed by Yousuff Fahim using Unity Game Engine in just 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 for the theme of YOU'RE NOT ALONE

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Mouse to Look Around

How to play:

  • Your twin is lost in the game world and you have to find him ASAP The twin is randomly spawned in a random place, each time you load the game.

Instructions:

  • Playing In full screen is recommended
  • Sometimes the Audio wont work when you load for first time, you can increase the volume in the Pause Menu

Credits:

  • Game Character Asset
  • BG Music
  • UI Icons

My Socials:

  • YouTube
  • Twitter
  • GitHub

Info:

  • This game is developed by a 15 yr old in just 7 days for the Brackeys Game 2022.2 with the theme of You're Not Alone. This is my first Jam and third game ever made and the first game I made without watching a YouTube tutorial :)
